name: LSGC
body:
### Welcome to the Life-Science Grid Community

The Life-Science Grid Community (LSGC) is a virtual research community to support life-science applications on the European Grid Infrastructure [(EGI)](http://www.egi.eu). 


### News

* April 2015: [Virtual Imaging Platform (VIP)](http://www.egi.eu/news-and-media/newsletters/Inspired_Issue_19/vip.html) inspires EGI. Also see a [typical use-case on multiple sclerosis.](http://www.egi.eu/case-studies/medical/ms_biomarkers.html).
* December 2013: [VAPOR beta version](https://operations-portal.egi.eu/vapor?vo=biomed) released.
* December 2013: [MosGrid VO](https://mosgrid.de) joins LSGC.
* November 2013: according to EGI's accounting statistics, LSGC VOs have been the most active ones in Life-Sciences in terms of number of executed jobs and consumed CPU during the last year. 
* May 2013: Johan Montagnat is elected as LSGC coordinator for the next year.
* April 2013: [DECIDE](https://www.eu-decide.eu) joins LSGC.
